abstract: Surveys suggest that people give Mr. Obama high marks on foreign policy, but that has not helped his overall approval ratings.
snippet: Surveys suggest that people give Mr. Obama high marks on foreign policy, but that has not helped his overall approval ratings.
lead_paragraph: If there was one area of doubt about Barack Obama that lingered in people's minds during - and even after - the 2008 campaign, it was how well he could handle a foreign policy crisis.

headline.main: The Value of Foreign Policy Victories for Obama
